name: Escape From Pub House
description: Escape From Pub House is a point and click type game developed by BestEscapeGames. One day Ramph has gone for a party with his friends to a famous Pub House in that city. He has enjoyed a lot with drinking and finally left to hang over. When he woke up, he found himself alone and stuck inside the room. Help him to find out the related objects and solve the interesting puzzles to Escape from the Pub House. Keep on playing and have fun. Good luck.
